actions.script:
/* 

This Reaction monitors all form submissions (Interactions)
and adds Contacts who fill out forms to the Realm of whatever
forms they fill out.

For example, someone registers for PWC. This Reaction will
add that person to the PWC Realm.

This is needed because Fluro does not automatically add 
*existing* contacts to the Realms of forms when they fill 
them out.

*/

return done(null, input);

roles.title: Full Access
roles.firstLine: Grants access to Create, Edit, View and Delete almost every type of content in the system

title: Add Contact to Realm on form submission

tests.title: Actual form submission
Test  (New church setup test)
